content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Filter query results of YARA and osquery tasks by status January 9, 2024—Query results for YARA and osquery tasks can now be filtered by status to provide a brief overview. Quickly find the reason for failed tasks by hovering over the status icon next to endpoint names. Agentic SIEM & XDR → Forensics © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
